scene_description_enriched: A group of men, some carrying spears, are depicted in a procession. The foremost figure, wearing a gold tunic and a red cap, points towards a rocky outcrop covered in foliage. Behind him, other men in similar attire and blue tunics follow. In the distance, a fortified city or castle is visible on a hill. The scene is set in an outdoor landscape with rolling hills and trees.
scene_interpretation: This scene likely depicts a biblical narrative, possibly the Israelites marching through the wilderness or a military expedition. The presence of spears and a distant fortified city suggests a journey or a confrontation.
